Supporting Our Community

Community Support Services

We are committed to supporting our community members through various programs and services designed to help in times of need.

🧠

Mental Health Support

By appointment

Confidential counseling services and mental health resources for community members.

counseling@gurdwara.org
👴

Senior Care

Daily, 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM

Support services for elderly community members including transportation and home visits.

seniors@gurdwara.org
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦

Family Services

Weekdays, 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM

Support for families including parenting resources and marriage counseling.

family@gurdwara.org
🆘

Crisis Support

24/7 Emergency Hotline

24/7 emergency assistance and crisis intervention services.

crisis@gurdwara.org

Community Initiatives

🥫

Food Bank

Weekly distribution of groceries and essential items to families in need.

Every Saturday, 9:00 AM - 1:00 PM

💼

Job Search Assistance

Resume writing workshops and job placement support.

Monthly Workshops

📋

Immigration Support

Guidance and resources for immigration-related matters.

By appointment

🏠

Housing Assistance

Help finding temporary and permanent housing solutions.

Weekdays, 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM

Need Support?

Our team is here to help. Reach out to us to learn more about our support services or to schedule an appointment.

Contact Us
